But the project failed, causing the "Silent Crisis" (with millions of casualties on Earth, including nearly all members of the Magicians Guild). Ganossa sabotaged the project (the dimension gate was opened only for a small gap but then the Cyclotron as opening mechanism got out of control), and many Lucifer Hawks began wandering around freely on earth, killing and eating humans. So while attempting to heal the world, Gigelf (by accident) had opened the door for the Lucifer Hawks to our dimension, and only his daughter http://anidb.net/ch13443 [Katsumi Liqueur] (having inherited Gigelf`s magical power) will be able to either fully open or completely close the dimension gate - she`s "the key". But Ganossa is still alive and has his own agenda, concealed even from the King of Nemesis. 24 years later, http://anidb.net/ch13449 [Rally Cheyenne] (being the daughter of a Guild Magician but only a child in the days of the Silent Crisis) formed the http://anidb.net/ch25714 [AMP] with the intention of making up for this failure and continuing the work of the Magicians Guild to protect humankind; nearly all other AMP members (Katsumi as Gigelf`s daughter, http://anidb.net/ch13447 [Lebia] as Stefan L. Maverick`s granddaughter, http://anidb.net/ch13445 [Nami] as http://anidb.net/ch25788 [Razan]`s daughter, http://anidb.net/ch13448 [Mana] as http://anidb.net/ch25782 [Genvara]`s financé, http://anidb.net/ch25715 [Lum Cheng] as http://anidb.net/ch25802 [Avalanche Wong]`s granddaughter) are also closely related to key figures of the project, thus carrying the responsibility for the deeds of their ancestors on their shoulders.

character.name: Brighton
character.description: A http://anidb.net/ch25784 [Magicians Guild] member, nicknamed "Fighting Machine". (According to the manga his ability is to manipulate the force of gravity.)

character.name: Lufa
character.description: A member of the http://anidb.net/ch25784 [Magicians Guild]; expert for teleportation. The manga has her name as "Lufa Cheyenne", implying she is http://anidb.net/ch13449 [Rally]`s and http://anidb.net/ch25720 [Rosa]`s mother. We can see Rally teleport herself in http://anidb.net/e18204 [episode 24] so she might have inherited this ability.

character.name: Yamigumo Razan
character.description: Shinto priest and sword fighter; son of http://anidb.net/ch25775 [Yamigumo Kouhou], father of http://anidb.net/ch13445 [Yamigumo Nami] and http://anidb.net/ch25770 [Yamigumo Nana]. Has a high sense of honor but is prone to imprudent actions. Tried to foil the "http://anidb.net/ch25784 [Project Gaia]" (that he considered too dangerous) by attempting to kill http://anidb.net/ch25713 [Gigelf Liqueur] but aborted his sword attack when http://anidb.net/ch25731 [Hazuki Fuyuka] protected Gigelf with her body. Later he joined forces with Gigelf and fought at his side; in the manga his role is more substantial than in the anime.

character.name: Hiroko Yamashita
character.description: Hiroko Yamashita is a childhood friend of http://anidb.net/ch13446 [Yuki Saiko]. She appears only as photograph (with her name in roumaji, no kanji) on a screen of the http://anidb.net/ch25714 [AMP] office when her death is reported in the TV news. She was part of the http://anidb.net/ch25796 [YLEM project] and escaped from the laboratory together with her friends Yuki and http://anidb.net/ch25792 [Lisa].

character.name: Lisa Emelpha
character.description: Lisa Emelpha is a childhood friend of http://anidb.net/ch13446 [Yuki Saiko]. She appears only as photograph (with her name in roumaji, no kanji) on a screen of the http://anidb.net/ch25714 [AMP] office when her death is reported in the TV news. She was part of the http://anidb.net/ch25796 [YLEM project] and escaped from the laboratory together with her friends Yuki and http://anidb.net/ch25791 [Hiroko].

character.name: Lisa-chan
character.description: Lisa Emelpha as child, back in the days of the http://anidb.net/ch25796 [YLEM project]. Lisa`s special ability is never mentioned; it might possibly have been throwing fireballs as shown by http://anidb.net/ch25716 [Annie] who must have acquired whatever ability Lisa had by killing her.

character.name: Hiroko-chan
character.description: Hiroko Yamashita as child, back in the days of the http://anidb.net/ch25796 [YLEM project]. Hiroko`s special ability was teleporting objects, as mentioned by http://anidb.net/ch13446 [Saiko Yuki] during episode 10. http://anidb.net/ch25716 [Annie] acquired this ability by killing http://anidb.net/ch25791 [Hiroko] during the events of episode 10; Yuki acquired this ability by defeating Annie at the end of episode 10. Yuki being able to teleport all http://anidb.net/ch25714 [AMP] members out of the destruction area of their office during the battle in episode 25 allowed the whole AMP team to survive the "F mission" strike.

character.name: YLEM project
character.description: A scientific project of the http://anidb.net/ch25777 [Tajima] Laboratory, performing generic manipulation of children in order to increase their YLPER (YLEM perception, see http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Ylem) abilities. The ultimate goal of the project was to creating the "perfect human weapon". Each child specialized in one ability; ultimately these abilities were meant to be transferred to another person by killing its owner. Amongst these children were http://anidb.net/ch25798 [Annie-chan], http://anidb.net/ch25794 [Hiroko-chan] (code name: XRP-8), http://anidb.net/ch25793 [Lisa-chan] (code name: XRP-12), and http://anidb.net/ch25799 [Yuki-chan] (code name: XRP-77) who, being the most talented one, was decided to become the final result of the project. But with Yuki, Lisa and Hiroko having escaped from the laboratory the project was never completed. 12 years later, http://anidb.net/ch25792 [Lisa Emelpha] (Lisa-chan) and http://anidb.net/ch25791 [Yamashita Hiroko] (Hiroko-chan) were both killed by http://anidb.net/ch25716 [Annie] during the events of episode 10, thus Annie gained the abilties of both victims; Annie was then defeated by Yuki at the end of episode 10, causing all of Annie`s abilities to be transferred to http://anidb.net/ch13446 [Saiko Yuki], exactly as Tajima-hakase had intended. The project was funded by http://anidb.net/ch25804 [Washio Tooru] with the intention of giving humankind an effective weapon against the http://anidb.net/ch25718 [Lucifer Hawks]. By effectively `creating` Saiko Yuki of the http://anidb.net/ch25714 [AMP] this way and putting her into a position where she traveled through time back to the days of http://anidb.net/ch25803 [Washio`s youth] (1997, i. e. 13 years before Yuki-chan was even born), thus making him want to support humankind against the LH in the first place, he created a time travel paradox. But with Yuki being able to teleport the AMP members out of the destruction area during the battle in episode 25, Tooru actually got the result he had planned. (The Bandai U.S. release for Silent Möbius - as well as the official German sub - mistranslated "YLEM" to "IREM" (going by the audio pattern) during the episode 25 dialog, making the connection quite difficult to understand.)

character.name: Annie
character.description: Annie as child, back in the days of the http://anidb.net/ch25796 [YLEM project]. Annie`s special ability apparently was throwing fireballs as this was the attack she used in episode 10.

character.name: Yuki-chan
character.description: Saiko Yuki as child, back in the days of the http://anidb.net/ch25796 [YLEM project]. Yuki`s code name "XRP-77" became the name of episode 10 of the TV series. Yuki`s special ability was precognition and clairvoyance, thus she was able to foresee her own future when staying in the laboratory and decided to run away together with her friends http://anidb.net/ch25793 [Lisa-chan] and http://anidb.net/ch25794 [Hiroko-chan].

character.name: Kramer
character.description: Elder, i. e. leader of the http://anidb.net/ch25784 [Magicans Guild] in the year 1999. His full name Kramer Hagenbach is mentioned only in the manga. (No text lines in the anime; his role is more substantial in the manga volume "Möbius Klein".)

character.name: Shutoro Zekku
character.description: Ice mage. No voice role in the anime. In manga volume "Möbius Klein" he has an important role during a battle where http://anidb.net/ch25713 [Gigelf Liqueur] is involved.

character.name: Avalanche Wong
character.description: Avalanche Wong is the only surviving member of the http://anidb.net/ch25784 [Magicians Guild]. He lives in Neo Hong Hong (Kaulun). http://anidb.net/ch25715 [Lum Cheng] is his granddaughter, thus he is probably also somehow related to http://anidb.net/ch25782 [Genvara Cheng]. He is very old and of short stature; his eyes are never visible.

character.name: Washio Tooru (young)
character.description: Lives in Tokyo in the year 1997 (i. e. two years before the events of the http://anidb.net/ch25784 [Silent Crisis]), and meets http://anidb.net/ch13446 [Saiko Yuki] there (who came to this time by travelling 30 years backwards in time).

character.name: Washio Tooru (old)
character.description: President of the EG company (EG社会長); as such, founder and funder of the http://anidb.net/ch25796 [YLEM project]. His age must be around 48 as he was 17 back in 1997 and the TV series timeline ends in 2028. He is also the owner of the house where http://anidb.net/ch13446 [Saiko Yuki] runs her cafe free of rent, thus he has secretly taken care of his beloved one for many years. The scar on his nose is the result of the http://anidb.net/ch26031 [Lucifer Hawk]`s attack back then.

character.name: Itabashi Queen
character.description: A character in an anime (!) that is running on an video screen in the background of a scene in Silent Möbius TV. She has only few dialog lines but these happen to match the current situation of the episode.

character.name: Nagata Juukou no Shachou
character.description: Nagata Shinjirou (his given name appears only in the manga) is president of the Nagata Heavy Industries Corporation, producer of Megadyne cyborgs. His company also develops the K-worms on behalf of http://anidb.net/ch25712 [Ganossa Maximilian].

character.name: Stoskeros
character.description: A Lucifer Hawk demon. He takes control over a Megadyne cyborg produced by http://anidb.net/ch25811 [Nagata Heavy Industries] in order to get http://anidb.net/ch13444 [Kiddy Phenyl] falsely accused of killing a civilian, critically injuring http://anidb.net/ch25721 [Ralph Bowmers] in the process.

character.name: Kaibou-i Meller
character.description: Forensic Pathologist in the police records department of Tokyo. In the know about the http://anidb.net/ch25725 ["Domull" project]; warns http://anidb.net/ch25723 [Robert DeVice] not to stick his nose into this affair.

character.name: Otome
character.description: The only survivor of a massacre in a tower building of Tokyo. (Her name isn`t mentioned in the anime; Wikipedia suggests it might be "Alice".) Actually she`s no human but a http://anidb.net/ch25718 [Lucifer Hawk] who has taken over the girl`s body (in order to free her comrades whose body fluids the Tokyo police intends to extract a drug named "Domull" from, giving them powers equal to those of a LH, with http://anidb.net/ch25725 [Aida] being one of the guinea pigs).

character.name: Wire
character.description: A Megadyne (cyborg) of http://anidb.net/ch25811 [Nagata Heayy Industries]. Never speaks a word in the anime. His name stems from his weapon, a thin long wire he uses to slice his victims into pieces. He is http://anidb.net/ch13444 [Kiddy Phenyl]`s archenemy: Wire was responsible for killing almost her complete police squad, and her driving force for living (and having turned into a Megadyne herself) is her longing for revenge.

character.name: Damia
character.description: http://anidb.net/ch25718 [Lucifer Hawk] of (the highest) Category I; http://anidb.net/ch25712 [Ganossa Maximilian]`s companion. Ganossa orders him to kill http://anidb.net/ch25723 [Robert DeVice] in order to find out how strong a mere human can be against a mighty LH when his powers are increased by... http://anidb.net/e18200 [love].

character.name: Lloyd
character.description: Police superintendent, and (probably the direct) superior of http://anidb.net/ch25721 [Ralph Bowmers]. His full name Lloyd Vota is mentioned only in the manga.

character.name: Lucifer
character.description: Lucifer himself. Surveillant of the pact between http://anidb.net/ch25712 [Ganossa Maximilian] and Nemesis; reports to the King of Nemesis. In the manga part going beyond the TV series (the "final battle" that is only announced at the series` end), Ganossa betrays Nemesis, and Lucifer sides with the http://anidb.net/ch25714 [AMP] to stop him.

character.name: Taiin
character.description: Taiin (literally "Group Members") is a swarm of 1500 http://anidb.net/ch25718 [Lucifer Hawks] forming one huge monster. This swarm is controlled by one particular Lucifer Hawk whom Ma-ken Medium addresses as Bratieze. (Dialog lines only in episode 24, thus only credited there in the ED section.) This super-being directly attacks the http://anidb.net/ch25714 [AMP]`s headquarter, merging with the building`s walls.

character.name: Visioneers
character.description: Visioneers are humans who developed a special relation to machines. Living in a sort of symbiosis, they are connected with all of her five senses to them. Most of them live in Junk Castle, a district of Old Tokyo; only a small part of them, including http://anidb.net/ch13447 [Lebia Maverick], are integrated into human society. Their existence was detected by http://anidb.net/ch25760 [Stefan L. Maverick].

character.name: Zairim
character.description: The appearance of the antiquary as http://anidb.net/ch25718 [Lucifer Hawk].

episode.title: 九竜の少女
Lum Cheng
Lum Cheng: Das Mädchen aus Jiu Long
Une jeune fille de Kowloon
Kaorun no Shoujo
月の生まれた夜
Dark Side of the MOON
Die Nacht, in der der Mond neu erstand
Nuit de nouvelle lune
Tsuki no Umareta Yoru
